Articles.Content:
I tried out a mod by the name of Re-store witch redoes/re-sizes / combines non-modded original parts into new ones and it got me thinking that original KSP need new wingy bits. SO i am suggestion the following;

  1. A long narrow non swept wing, think of the wings off an A-10 warthog all one piece.
  2. I delta type wing that is a combination of a wing root and a delta wing right before it.
  3. Straight wing pieces different sizes all non-swept, long wide pieces, short fat pieces I'm sure you can get it.
  4. Bi-wing assemblies, two non-swept wings that attach tot he top and bottom of the tank they are attached to.

I tried to suggest this on the Kerbal Kon twitch stream but the chat was too quick and i was unsure if it was seen. I know other players DID spot it as i had a few " yes that would be great, and moar wings now!" replies. So i decided to place it up here.
For #4... Parts cannot attach to two places at the same time, so that is not likely to work at all.
With a single straight wing, two can be stacked to make a bi wing
It will only connect in one place but he part looks like it was two wings stacked atop one another. And i was suggestion it as an assembly to make it easier to do a bi-wing design.
